heroHeading: Learning is fun with Kiddo AI!
heroSubheading: Your smart assistant to understand lessons through interactive stories and auto-reading.
featuresSubheading: Kiddo AI is designed to make learning fun and engaging for kids.

feature1.title: Easy Learning
feature1.description: Learn lessons in a fun and easy way through interactive stories.

feature2.title: Interactive Stories
feature2.description: Read suggested or custom stories with auto-reading support.

feature3.title: Simple and Fun Interface for Kids

step1.title: Enter
step1.heading: Enter Lesson Title Or Upload PDF
step1.description: Enter the lesson title you want to learn or upload a PDF file to get started.

step2.title: Customize
step2.heading: Customize Ai Response
step2.description: Customize the AI response to make it more interactive and engaging like size, has image, has audio

step3.title: Enjoy
step3.heading: Enjoy Learning

step1.heading: Enter Story Title Or Make Ai suggest
step1.description: Enter the story title you want to read or make AI suggest a story for you.

step2.title: Customize
step2.heading: Customize Ai Response

step3.heading: Enjoy Learning

why1: Provides an alternative to expensive private lessons.
why2: Helps children understand without time strain.
why3: Fun and entertaining experience through interactive stories.
CTAText: Sign up now and start using our services for free.

q1.title: Can I try Kiddo AI for free?

q2.title: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time.

q3.title: Can I change the story?
q3.answer: Yes, you can change the story.

q4.title: Can I change the story language?
q4.answer: Yes, you can change the story language.

q5.title: How can I download a lesson or story?
q5.answer: You can download the lesson or story by clicking the download button and you can download the story or lesson as a PDF or audio file (if available).

q6.title: Is the content here 100% safe?
q6.answer: This content is provided by AI, and since AI is still in continuous development, we cannot guarantee that all content here is 100% safe, but we do our best to ensure that.

infoMessage: We do not store any of your information on our servers. All your data, including your email, name, stories, and lessons you have created, are stored only on your personal browser.
pleaseLogin: Please login to access this page.
